summary.subtotal.tooltip.value: The subtotal reflects the total price of your order before any applicable discounts. It does not include delivery costs and taxes.

summary.subtotal.tooltip.includesTaxes.value: The subtotal reflects the total price of your order before any applicable discounts. It does not include delivery costs.
summary.subtotal.tooltip.includesTaxes.description: Subtotal tooltip for countries that calculate taxes as part of their subtotal.

summary.subtotal.tooltip.noShippingOrTax.value: The subtotal reflects the total price of your order, including any applicable product taxes and before any applicable discounts. It does not include delivery costs, duty and import tax charges and international transaction fees.
summary.subtotal.tooltip.noShippingOrTax.description: Tooltip explanation when shipping or taxes are not included.

summary.subtotal.tooltip.noShippingOrTax.value: The subtotal reflects the total price of your order before any applicable discounts. It does not include delivery costs, taxes and international transaction fees.
summary.subtotal.tooltip.noShippingOrTax.description: Explanation that the summary does not includes taxes, shipping costs, or international transaction fees.

summary.subtotal.tooltip.taxesAndDuties.value: The subtotal reflects the total price of your order, including duties and taxes, before any applicable discounts. It does not include delivery costs and international transaction fees.
summary.subtotal.tooltip.taxesAndDuties.description: Subtotal tooltip that includes taxes and duties.

summary.subtotal.tooltip.taxesOnly.value: The subtotal reflects the total price of your order, including taxes, before any applicable discounts. It does not include delivery costs and international transaction fees.
summary.subtotal.tooltip.taxesOnly.description: Explanation that the summary does not include delivery costs and international fees, but DOES includes taxes.

summary.tax.link.tooltip.description: Summary Tax Tooltip Learn More Link

summary.tax.tooltip.value: The actual tax will be calculated based on the applicable duty tax and sales tax when your order is dispatched.

hf_cookie_label_yourCookieSettings.description: Western Europe requires Nike to notify the user that we are using cookies

hf_cookie_policy_banner.value: Nike processes information about your visit using cookies to improve site performance, facilitate social media sharing and offer advertising tailored to your interests. By continuing to browse our site, you agree to the use of these cookies. For more information see our {privacyAndCookiePolicyHTML}. You can adjust your preferences in {cookieSettingsHTML}.
hf_cookie_policy_banner.description: The privacy policy text for the cookie banner

hf_cookie_policy_banner_ok.description: The localized text for the OK button in the cookie banner

hf_cookie_text_do_you_accept.value: Do you accept these cookies and the processing of personal data involved?
hf_cookie_text_do_you_accept.description: Abbreviation of hf_cookie_text_policy, used for accessibility of cookie banner

hf_cookie_text_footer.value: You can always change your preference by visiting 'Cookie Settings' at the bottom of the page. View {privacyAndCookiePolicyHTML} for full details.
hf_cookie_text_footer.description: The text used for the cookie modals footer

hf_cookie_text_functional.value: These cookies are required for basic site functionality and are therefore always enabled. These include cookies that allow you to be remembered as you explore the site within a single session or, if you request, from session to session. They help to make the bag and checkout process possible as well as assisting in security issues and conforming to regulations.
hf_cookie_text_functional.description: Text description for the functional purpose of cookies

hf_cookie_text_information.description: Text description for cookie information, second line

hf_cookie_text_performance.value: These cookies allow us to improve the site’s functionality by tracking usage on the website. In some cases these cookies can improve the speed with which we can process your request as they allow us to remember site preferences that you’ve selected. De-selecting these cookies may result in poorly tailored recommendations and slow site performance.

hf_cookie_text_policy.value: Nike asks you to accept cookies for performance, social media and advertising purposes. Social media and advertising cookies of third parties are used to offer you social media functionalities and personalised ads. To get more information or amend your preferences, click the ‘More Information’ button or visit 'Cookie Settings' at the bottom of the website. To get more information about these cookies and the processing of your personal data, check our {privacyAndCookiePolicyHTML}. Do you accept these cookies and the processing of personal data involved?
hf_cookie_text_policy.description: The main text used for the cookie modal agreement

hf_cookie_text_socialMedia.value: Social media cookies offer the possibility to connect you to your social networks and share content from our website through social media. Advertising cookies (of third parties) collect information to help better tailor advertising to your interests, both within and beyond Nike websites. In some cases, these cookies involve the processing of your personal data. For more information about this processing of personal data, check our {privacyAndCookiePolicyHTML}. De-selecting these cookies may result in seeing advertising that is not as relevant to you or you not being able to link effectively with Facebook, Twitter, or other social networks and/or not allowing you to share content on social media.
hf_cookie_text_socialMedia.description: The text used for the social and media description in the cookie modal

hf_cookie_text_socialMedia_2.value: Social media cookies offer the possibility for you to connect to your social networks and share content from our website through social media. Advertising cookies (from third parties) collect information to help better tailor advertising to your interests, both within and beyond Nike websites. In some cases, these cookies involve the processing of your personal data. For more information about this processing of personal data, check our {privacyAndCookiePolicyHTML}. De-selecting these cookies may result in you seeing advertising that is not as relevant to you, not being able to link effectively to Facebook, Twitter or other social networks, and/or not being allowed to share content on social media.
hf_cookie_text_socialMedia_2.description: The text describing what social media cookies are used for

sub_footer_modal_body_text.value:
Name of content: product information, event information etc.
Date of creation of the content: cut-over date (or its update date if the content has been upgraded)
All content in the web page is protected for five years from the date of production or its renewal under the Content Industry Promotion Act (unauthorised copying is prohibited without consent)

sub_footer_modal_body_text_one.description: first line of the sub footer body content

arrivesByMessage.description: Indicates the product will arrive no later than this time (no minimum date given, only max arrival date), Example: ">Arrives by< Thu, Oct 24"

arrivesMessage.description: Indicates the product will arrive at a certain date range (minimum and maximum arrival dates given), Example: ">Arrives< Thu, Oct 24 - Thu, Oct 25"

arrivesToMessage.description: Separates date and postal code, if postal code given, Example: "Arrives Thu, Oct 25 >to< 97201"

collectInStoreHeaderMessage.description: Estimated collect in store date header

editLocationMessage.description: text for call to action to edit location information, if no postal code given, Example: "Arrives Thu, Oct 24 >Edit Location<"

postalCodeInputError.description: Inform user to try input again when attempt to retrieve estimated delivery date or store pickup options fails

shippingOptionsCopy.value: All prices and dates are subject to change. Actual delivery options will be calculated during checkout. Product availability may delay expedited delivery of certain items.
shippingOptionsCopy.description: Message to users regarding shipping option dates and prices

zipCode.description: Postal code included in a postal address for the purpose of sorting mail

APPID_REQUIRED.value: Sorry, this code cannot be applied.The promotion is exclusive to another Nike shopping experience.

MEMBERSHIP_REQUIRED.value: To use this code, create or sign in to your free Nike Membership account.

ORDER_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED.value: To use this code, you need fewer items in your bag.Remove an item, then try again.

ORDER_THRESHOLD_NOT_MET.value: To use this code, you need more items in your bag.Add an item, then try again.

PRODUCTS_EXCLUDED.value: Selected products are excluded from this promotion

SHIPPING_NOT_DISCOUNTED.value: Good news, the selected delivery option is already free.

SHIPPING_NOT_PROVIDED.value: To use this code, please select a delivery method at checkout.

SHIPPING_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED.value: To use this code, select a slower delivery method at checkout.

SHIPPING_THRESHOLD_NOT_MET.value: To use this code, select a faster delivery method at checkout.

SWOOSH_EXCLUDED.value: To use this code, sign out of your Swoosh account.

SWOOSH_REQUIRED.value: To use this code, sign in to your Swoosh account.

088A044B.value: Quantity is more than the allowed quantity for the item sku.
088A044B.description: /buy/cart_reviews/v2/ITEM_QUANTITY_LIMIT - Quantity is more than the allowed quantity for the item sku

152A080B.value: VAS associated with the item is valid but invalid for item.

17EDDF38.value: Fulfilment details provided did not match any of the valid ones found.
17EDDF38.description: /buy/cart_reviews/v2/FULFILLMENT_OPTIONS_INVALID - Fulfillment details provided did not match any of the valid ones found

2BD60001.value: No valid fulfilment options were found for an item.

30736BE7.value: VAS associated with the item is valid but unavailable.

438D86D4.value: A required field or fields in the request was missing.
438D86D4.description: /buy/cart_reviews/v2/MISSING_REQUIRED - A required field or fields in the request was missing

JP.podium_tax_included.description: A note near the price of an item to denote that tax is included.

podium_incl_tax_duties.description: A note near the price to indicate it includes taxes and duties

podium_lowest_price.description: A note near the price that indicates the discounted price is the lowest price, a requirement in PL and other geos

podium_sale_price.description: A note near the price to indicate it is a sale price
